page.title: 02HOLIDAY CENTRE WEST FLEGG
page.content: If you visit the village of Martham it is worth going to the old Medieval church with its lovely woodwork and stained glass windows. If you like walking there are many footpaths and farm tracks that run from the two villages through the arable fields where there are lots of birds and wild animals to see and many beautiful wild flowers in the hedges and fields. {Things to do}The Broads are a great place for birdwatchers to come and people of all ages come here for sports,fishing both from a boat and on the shore and canoeing. The shady woodland and parkland around the broads are great places to have picnics. If you have children they can play on the playing fields by Rollesby Road Martham or near Rollesby school.
